headline: Politically Georgia: David Perdue calls in a favor from Donald Trump
author: Patricia Murphy
sentences: Brian Kemp is leveraging his office to strengthen his conservative credentials, Herschel Walker is ignoring his Republican rivals in the U.S. Senate race and tempers are flaring under the Gold Dome.
Host Greg Bluestein and Political Insider columnist Patricia Murphy discuss how Donald Trump plans to boost Perdues campaign in the latest episode of the Politically Georgia podcast.
Listen and subscribe to our podcast for free at Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Google Podcasts, or Stitcher.
Republican David Perdues campaign for governor is struggling, but reinforcements are on the way.
